author: Staff Reporter
text:
Amid high drama, a 45-year-old man along with his family members attempted self-immolation at the Collectorate here on Monday.

Police said Ravi from Mudaliarpet was dejected over lack of action on repeated petitions he had submitted to the police against his brothers over a property dispute.

Ravi had stated that his brothers Dasarathan and Paramaguru had refused to vacate their ancestral house even after he had settled the amount. He alleged that his brothers had threatened him of dire consequences.

Seeking action on his complaint, Ravi came along with his wife Gomathi and two minor daughters to the collectorate and doused themselves.

Police personnel thwarted their attempt immediately and made an enquiry with Ravi and promised to look into his complaint.
title: Man attempts immolation alleging police apathy
